title: Viral Hoax About 1000 Rupees Coins Issued By RBI Revived
subtitle: BOOM found these coins are commemorative and not meant to be used as legal tender.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Photographs of 1000 rupee coins which were recently launched by the Reserve Bank of India

A facebook post falsely claimed that the Reserve Bank of India has launched coins of 1000 rupee denominations. According to a report in The Hindu ‘, these coins were minted to commemorate 1,000 years of the Brihadeswara temple in Thanjavur. These are not meant to be used as legal tender.
